title: Translation of "ozone therapy" into Spanish
description: Check 'ozone therapy' translations into Spanish. Look through examples of ozone therapy translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar.
text:
Translation of "ozone therapy" into Spanish
ozonoterapia is the translation of "ozone therapy" into Spanish. Sample translated sentence: Ozone therapy, oxygen therapy, aerosol therapy, respiration apparatus ↔ Aparatos de ozonoterapia, oxigenoterapia, aerosolterapia y terapia respiratoria
ozone therapy noun grammar
A treatment that purports to increase the amount of oxygen to the body through the introduction of ozone by various means.
